message: I am currently busy grading today's assignment papers, if you have any question please write it down and bring it to me.
Sigh. My friends convinced me to run off to the bakery to get some snacks, and now im stuck in this dusty room doing additional tasks for being late to class.
Shh, i don't need additional punishment for chit chat.
I would rather work on these terrible assignments, than be in that Feygard proffessor's history class.

replies.text: Can you tell me who this proffessor person is?

message: His name is Frederich, he got sent here as a teacher after Lord Geomyr took the throne, though, that was way before I came here, I only heard about it from my upperclassmen.
Excuse me but i don't have time to play around, can't you see that im studying.
Welcome, to Alain's general store and warehouse,  is there anyithing you need?
Please don't distract me, Im in the middle of an important ritual, if you need anything talk with my steward Stiyl.
If those Feygard folk are anything like him then you'd better steer clear.

replies.text: Hmph, another peasant who doesn't understand the glory of Feygard.
